"There is an error while trying to send the recover account email: "
The user or password you have entered is wrong.
The secondary passwords does not match, please be sure both are identically.
The main passwords does not match, please be sure both are identically.
The passwords length must be six characters at least, please check it all.
The passwords have benn updated correctly.
The main password and the secondary password cannot be the same, please be sure both are diferents.
We could not connect with the google payment services, sorry... Please try later and make sure you have internet access.
There is no internet connection, we cannot continue without it.
You will soon be able to edit your profile information.
The option to share the note will soon be available.
The option to bookmark the exams will be available soon.
Welcome! This is the TestMy Application release, we hope it can be useful for you. To learn how to use this app, please go to the next link: Watch tutorial
In our next release: /n /n - Delete documents option. /n /n - Excel report sheet improvements. /n /n - Premium report option enabled with more details and email share.

TestMy allows the registration of users, who must generate a main password and a secondary password, when registering successfully you should get an email with your account. When logging in with the main user and password, the option of creation, presentation of tests and visualization of reports is enabled, as well as the purchases in the store. \n \n On the other hand, when entering with the user and the secondary password, only the option to present tests, surveys, where you have to choose between the existing tests and enter an additional password of 4 digits corresponding to that test; That is, the total control has the main user, who must supply secondary passwords and by exam to their students, followers, respondents, etc. /n /n Please watch the next tutorial to learn more about how to use the app: Go to TestMy tutorial

In addition, the user has the option to reset the passwords and to ask for the password of his user when he has forgotten it. To see reports into another device, you just need to login with your primary password on it.

The application allows to create tests and / or surveys dynamically with an indeterminate number of questions, indicating the text of the question, the text four possible answers associated with that question, an image associated with that question, the number of the answer that corresponds to the question Correct, among other main data like the title, the total time and the four-digit password for its presentation.

There is a display option for data presentation of tests, surveys that lists the number of users that submitted with all their detail data and the option for non-premium users to export such data to excel ... \ n \ n Premium users will be able to export the data through the application, which will send an email with the report files.

The application has among its products available at the store to date, the option to disable advertising, the option to configure multiple selection responses and the option of premium reports directed to the users email.

The students or respondents will enter basic data of their profile, followed by the beginning of the test or survey, where they will have a time for their presentation, a single answer selection per question and a completion message that shows the final note if it is a test and not a survey, thanks to an algorithm.
You do not have an account? .... Sign Up
Please, enter the email you registered and we will send you a new password.
You have been finished the exam/survey, thanks for your time!. The score is:
Dear user, you must complete the required fields to continue with another question.
Dear user, you cannot use this option in your first question.
Are you sure you have finished editing your survey / survey data? If so, you will save the data entered on the server.
Dear user, you must complete the required fields in order to continue with the following question
Are you sure you have finished with your presentation? If you do, press finish button, in other case press cancel button.
The excel file was successfully generated
There is no reports to show, please someone must complete a test, exam, survey before check any reports.
Sorry, an error occurred while exporting the report data to excel.
Dear user, you must create an exam/survey first, so that it appears in the list of available tests to present. Please return to the previous window.
There has been an error sending the email with the attached report, please try again later.
We are sorry, you have reach the maximum tests/surveys creation that is three. You have to go to the store and buy unlimited tests/surveys creation product.
The data has been sent, now uploading the images, please wait a bit.
The document was created successfully. You must login to use it.
There was an error uploading document images.
We are sorry, this user login or user email already exists, please try again.
We are sorry, there was an error executing this task into the server.
There is no report results for this document.
The user you have entered is not registered, please sign up.
The user has been registered, please login.

It is not posible to return once the test, survey, exam has begin.
There is no questions before this one.
Dear user, you must fullfil all the required fields.
The entered password is not correct. Try again.
Dear user, you must create a test, exam, survey first to continue. Please, go back.
Do you really want to leave TestMy?
The maximum file size allowed is 100kb. Please fix your image.
